content: the inspiration for the summer lovers socks came from the beautiful color of the yarn as soon as i saw this yarn i knew it would look stunning in a simple lace design the lightly speckled yarn showcases the pattern beautifully staying true to the socks that i enjoy knitting i always choose easy-to-memorize patterns that allow me to take them on the go i hope you enjoy making these socks as much as i did **yarn** collection louise robert - super sock 75% mérinos sw 25% nylon 400 m par 100 g - 1 écheveau - présenté en the kiss ou collection patricknits - bis-sock 85% mérinos sw 15% nylon 400 m par 100 g - 1 écheveau ou les laines biscotte - bis-sock 85% mérinos sw 15% nylon 400 m par 100 g - 1 écheveau **needles and notions** aiguille circulaire de 2 5 mm us1 5 - 80 cm 32 pour tricoter magic loop ou la taille requise pour obtenir l échantillon aiguille à laine marqueurs de mailles **sizes** adulte petit moyen grand longueur du pied ajustable **échantillon** 36 m = 10 cm 4 pouces
